00053 Range::Range(MasterClientPtr &master_client_ptr, TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schemaPtr, RangeSpec *range, RangeState *state) : CellList(), m_mutex(), m_master_client_ptr(master_client_ptr), m_identifier(identifier), m_schema(schemaPtr), m_maintenance_in_progress(false), m_last_logical_timestamp(0), m_hold_updates(false), m_update_counter(0), m_added_inserts(0), m_state(*state), m_error(Error::OK) {
00054   AccessGroup *ag;
00055   
00056   memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00057 
00058   if (m_state.soft_limit == 0 || m_state.soft_limit > Global::rangeMaxBytes)
00059     m_state.soft_limit = Global::rangeMaxBytes;
00060 
00061   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00062   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00063 
00064   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0 && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00065 
00066   m_column_family_vector.resize( m_schema->get_max_column_family_id() + 1 );
00067 
00068   list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *agList = m_schema->get_access_group_list();
00069 
00070   for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator agIter = agList->begin(); agIter != agList->end(); agIter++) {
00071     ag = new AccessGroup(identifier, m_schema, (*agIter), range);
00072     m_access_group_map[(*agIter)->name] = ag;
00073     m_access_group_vector.push_back(ag);
00074     for (list<Schema::ColumnFamily *>::iterator cfIter = (*agIter)->columns.begin(); cfIter != (*agIter)->columns.end(); cfIter++)
00075       m_column_family_vector[(*cfIter)->id] = ag;
00076   }
00077 
00081   if (m_is_root) {
00082     MetadataRoot metadata(m_schema);
00083     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00084   }
00085   else {
00086     MetadataNormal metadata(&m_identifier, m_end_row);
00087     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00088   }
00089 
00090   return;
00091 }

00096 Range::~Range() {
00097   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00098     delete m_access_group_vector[i];
00099 }

00106 void Range::load_cell_stores(Metadata *metadata) {
00107   int error;
00108   AccessGroup *ag;
00109   CellStorePtr cellStorePtr;
00110   uint32_t csid;
00111   const char *base, *ptr, *end;
00112   std::vector<std::string> csvec;
00113   std::string ag_name;
00114   std::string files;
00115   std::string file_str;
00116 
00117   metadata->reset_files_scan();
00118 
00119   while (metadata->get_next_files(ag_name, files)) {
00120     csvec.clear();
00121 
00122     if ((ag = m_access_group_map[ag_name]) == 0) {
00123       HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized access group name '%s' found in METADATA for table '%s'", ag_name.c_str(), m_identifier.name);
00124       continue;
00125     }
00126 
00127     ptr = base = (const char *)files.c_str();
00128     end = base + strlen(base);
00129     while (ptr < end) {
00130 
00131       while (*ptr != ';' && ptr < end)
00132         ptr++;
00133 
00134       file_str = std::string(base, ptr-base);
00135       boost::trim(file_str);
00136 
00137       if (file_str[0] == '#')
00138         file_str = file_str.substr(1);
00139 
00140       if (file_str != "")
00141         csvec.push_back(file_str);
00142 
00143       ++ptr;
00144       base = ptr;
00145     }
00146 
00147     for (size_t i=0; i<csvec.size(); i++) {
00148 
00149       HT_INFOF("Loading CellStore %s", csvec[i].c_str());
00150 
00151       cellStorePtr = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00152 
00153       if (!extract_csid_from_path(csvec[i], &csid)) {
00154         HT_ERRORF("Unable to extract cell store ID from path '%s'", csvec[i].c_str());
00155         continue;
00156       }
00157       if ((error = cellStorePtr->open(csvec[i].c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str())) != Error::OK) {
00158         // this should throw an exception
00159         HT_ERRORF("Problem opening cell store '%s', skipping...", csvec[i].c_str());
00160         continue;
00161       }
00162       if ((error = cellStorePtr->load_index()) != Error::OK) {
00163         // this should throw an exception
00164         HT_ERRORF("Problem loading index of cell store '%s', skipping...", csvec[i].c_str());
00165         continue;
00166       }
00167 
00168       ag->add_cell_store(cellStorePtr, csid);
00169     }
00170 
00171   }
00172 
00173 }

00176 
00179 bool Range::extract_csid_from_path(std::string &path, uint32_t *csidp) {
00180   const char *base;
00181 
00182   if ((base = strrchr(path.c_str(), '/')) == 0 || strncmp(base, "/cs", 3))
00183     *csidp = 0;
00184   else
00185     *csidp = atoi(base+3);
00186   
00187   return true;
00188 }

00193 int Range::add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, uint64_t real_timestamp) {
00194   Key key_comps;
00195 
00196   if (m_error)
00197     return m_error;
00198 
00199   HT_EXPECT(key_comps.load(key), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00200 
00201   if (key_comps.column_family_code >= m_column_family_vector.size()) {
00202     HT_ERRORF("Bad column family (%d)", key_comps.column_family_code);
00203     return Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY;
00204   }
00205 
00220   if (key_comps.timestamp > m_last_logical_timestamp)
00221     m_last_logical_timestamp = key_comps.timestamp;
00222 
00223   if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00224     for (AccessGroupMapT::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++) {
00225       (*iter).second->add(key, value, real_timestamp);
00226     }
00227   }
00228   else
00229     m_column_family_vector[key_comps.column_family_code]->add(key, value, real_timestamp);
00230 
00231   if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_INSERT)
00232     m_added_inserts++;
00233   else
00234     m_added_deletes[key_comps.flag]++;
00235 
00236   return Error::OK;
00237 }

00239 
00242 int Range::replay_add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, uint64_t real_timestamp, uint32_t *num_addedp) {
00243   Key key_comps;
00244 
00245   HT_EXPECT(key_comps.load(key), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00246 
00247   *num_addedp = 0;
00248 
00249   if (key_comps.column_family_code >= m_column_family_vector.size()) {
00250     HT_ERRORF("Bad column family (%d)", key_comps.column_family_code);
00251     return Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY;
00252   }
00253 
00254   if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00255     for (AccessGroupMapT::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++) {
00256       if ((*iter).second->replay_add(key, value, real_timestamp))
00257         (*num_addedp)++;
00258     }
00259   }
00260   else {
00261     if (m_column_family_vector[key_comps.column_family_code]->replay_add(key, value, real_timestamp))
00262       (*num_addedp)++;
00263   }
00264 
00265   if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_INSERT)
00266     m_added_inserts++;
00267   else
00268     m_added_deletes[key_comps.flag]++;
00269 
00270   return Error::OK;
00271 }

00275 CellListScanner *Range::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scanContextPtr) {
00276   bool return_deletes = scanContextPtr->spec ? scanContextPtr->spec->return_deletes : false;
00277   cout << flush;
00278   MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scanContextPtr, return_deletes);
00279   for (AccessGroupMapT::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++) {
00280     if ((*iter).second->include_in_scan(scanContextPtr))
00281       mscanner->add_scanner((*iter).second->create_scanner(scanContextPtr));
00282   }
00283   return mscanner;
00284 }

00287 uint64_t Range::disk_usage() {
00288   uint64_t usage = 0;
00289   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00290     usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->disk_usage();
00291   return usage;
00292 }

00299 void Range::get_compaction_priority_data(std::vector<AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityDataT> &priority_data_vector) {
00300   size_t next_slot = priority_data_vector.size();
00301 
00302   {
00303     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00304     priority_data_vector.resize( priority_data_vector.size() + m_access_group_vector.size() );
00305   }
00306 
00307   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00308     m_access_group_vector[i]->get_compaction_priority_data(priority_data_vector[next_slot]);
00309     next_slot++;
00310   }
00311 }

00313 
00314 void Range::split() {
00315   Timestamp timestamp;
00316   String old_start_row;
00317 
00318   HT_EXPECT(m_maintenance_in_progress, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00319   HT_EXPECT(!m_is_root, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00320 
00321   try {
00322 
00323     switch (m_state.state) {
00324 
00325     case (RangeState::STEADY):
00326       split_install_log(&timestamp, old_start_row);
00327       m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED;
00328 
00329     case (RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED):
00330       split_compact_and_shrink(timestamp, old_start_row);
00331       m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK;
00332 
00333     case (RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK):
00334       split_notify_master(old_start_row);
00335       m_state.state = RangeState::STEADY;
00336       m_state.transfer_log = "";
00337 
00338     }
00339 
00340   }
00341   catch (Exception &e) {
00342     m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00343     throw;
00344   }
00345 
00346   HT_INFOF("Split Complete.  New Range end_row=%s", m_start_row.c_str());
00347 
00348   m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00349 }

00353 
00356 void Range::split_install_log(Timestamp *timestampp, String &old_start_row) {
00357   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00358   char md5DigestStr[33];
00359 
00360   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00361     m_access_group_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, false);
00362 
00367   if (split_rows.size() < m_access_group_vector.size()) {
00368     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00369       m_access_group_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00370   }
00371   sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00372 
00383   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00384     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);    
00385     m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00386     if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00387       split_rows.clear();
00388       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00389         m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_rows(split_rows);
00390       if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00391         sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00392         m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00393         if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00394           m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00395           throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00396                           format("Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00397                                  m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()));
00398         }
00399       }
00400       else {
00401         m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00402         throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00403                         format("Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00404                                m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()));
00405       }
00406     } 
00407   }
00408   else {
00409     m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00410     throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00411                     format("Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00412                            m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()));
00413   }
00414 
00418   md5_string(m_split_row.c_str(), md5DigestStr);
00419   md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00420   m_state.set_transfer_log(Global::logDir + "/" + md5DigestStr);
00421 
00422   // Create transfer log dir
00423   try { Global::logDfs->mkdirs(m_state.transfer_log); }
00424   catch (Exception &e) {
00425     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating log directory '%s': %s",
00426               m_state.transfer_log, e.what());
00427     HT_ABORT;
00428   }
00429 
00430   /***************************************************/
00432   /***************************************************/
00433 
00437   {
00438     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_maintenance_mutex);
00439 
00441     m_hold_updates = true;
00442     while (m_update_counter > 0)
00443       m_update_quiesce_cond.wait(lock);
00444 
00445     {
00446       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00447       if (!m_scanner_timestamp_controller.get_oldest_update_timestamp(timestampp) ||
00448           timestampp->logical == 0)
00449         *timestampp = m_timestamp;
00450       old_start_row = m_start_row;
00451       m_split_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00452     }
00453 
00455     m_hold_updates = false;
00456     m_maintenance_finished_cond.notify_all();
00457   }
00458 }

00461 
00465 void Range::split_compact_and_shrink(Timestamp timestamp, String &old_start_row) {
00466   int error;
00467 
00471   {
00472     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00473       m_access_group_vector[i]->run_compaction(timestamp, true);
00474   }
00475 
00476   /****************************************************/
00478   /****************************************************/
00479 
00480   try {
00481     String files;
00482     String metadata_key_str;
00483     KeySpec key;
00484 
00485     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00486 
00490     metadata_key_str = std::string("") + (uint32_t)m_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
00491     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00492     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00493     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00494     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00495     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00496     mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)m_split_row.c_str(), m_split_row.length());
00497 
00501     metadata_key_str = std::string("") + (uint32_t)m_identifier.id + ":" + m_split_row;
00502     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00503     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00504     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00505     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00506 
00507     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00508     mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)old_start_row.c_str(), old_start_row.length());
00509 
00510     key.column_family = "Files";
00511     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00512       key.column_qualifier = m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name();
00513       key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name());
00514       m_access_group_vector[i]->get_files(files);
00515       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00516     }
00517 
00518     mutator_ptr->flush();
00519 
00520   }
00521   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00522     // TODO: propagate exception
00523     HT_ERRORF("Problem updating ROOT METADATA range (new=%s, existing=%s) - %s", m_split_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00524     // need to unblock updates and then return error
00525     HT_ABORT;
00526   }
00527 
00532   {
00533     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_maintenance_mutex);
00534 
00535     // block updates
00536     m_hold_updates = true;
00537     while (m_update_counter > 0)
00538       m_update_quiesce_cond.wait(lock);
00539 
00540     // Shrink access groups
00541     {
00542       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00543       m_start_row = m_split_row;
00544       m_split_row = "";
00545       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00546         m_access_group_vector[i]->shrink(m_start_row);
00547     }
00548 
00549     // Close and uninstall split log
00550     if ((error = m_split_log_ptr->close()) != Error::OK) {
00551       HT_ERRORF("Problem closing split log '%s' - %s", m_split_log_ptr->get_log_dir().c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00552     }
00553     m_split_log_ptr = 0;
00554 
00555     // unblock updates
00556     m_hold_updates = false;
00557     m_maintenance_finished_cond.notify_all();
00558   }
00559 }

00561 
00565 void Range::split_notify_master(String &old_start_row) {
00566   int error;
00567   RangeSpec range;
00568 
00569   range.start_row = old_start_row.c_str();
00570   range.end_row = m_start_row.c_str();
00571 
00572   // update the latest generation, this should probably be protected
00573   m_identifier.generation = m_schema->get_generation();
00574 
00575   HT_INFOF("Reporting newly split off range %s[%s..%s] to Master", m_identifier.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00576 
00577   if (m_state.soft_limit < Global::rangeMaxBytes) {
00578     m_state.soft_limit *= 2;
00579     if (m_state.soft_limit > Global::rangeMaxBytes)
00580       m_state.soft_limit = Global::rangeMaxBytes;
00581   }
00582 
00583   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->report_split(&m_identifier, range, m_state.transfer_log, m_state.soft_limit)) != Error::OK) {
00584     throw Exception(error, format("Problem reporting split (table=%s, start_row=%s, end_row=%s) to master.",
00585                                   m_identifier.name, range.start_row, range.end_row));
00586   }
00587   
00588 }

00590 
00591 void Range::compact(bool major) {
00592   run_compaction(major);
00593   m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00594 }
00595 
00596 
00597 void Range::run_compaction(bool major) {
00598   Timestamp timestamp;
00599 
00600   {
00601     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_maintenance_mutex);
00602 
00604     m_hold_updates = true;
00605     while (m_update_counter > 0)
00606       m_update_quiesce_cond.wait(lock);
00607 
00608     {
00609       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00610       timestamp = m_timestamp;
00611     }
00612 
00614     m_hold_updates = false;
00615     m_maintenance_finished_cond.notify_all();
00616   }
00617 
00622   Timestamp temp_timestamp;
00623   if (m_scanner_timestamp_controller.get_oldest_update_timestamp(&temp_timestamp) && temp_timestamp < timestamp)
00624     timestamp = temp_timestamp;
00625 
00626   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00627     m_access_group_vector[i]->run_compaction(timestamp, major);
00628 
00629 }

00631 
00635 void Range::dump_stats() {
00636   std::string range_str = (std::string)m_identifier.name + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00637   uint64_t collisions = 0;
00638   uint64_t cached = 0;
00639   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00640     collisions += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_collision_count();
00641     cached += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_count();
00642   }
00643   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded inserts\t" << m_added_inserts << endl;
00644   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded row deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[0] << endl;
00645   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded cf deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[1] << endl;
00646   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded cell deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[2] << endl;
00647   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded total\t" << (m_added_inserts + m_added_deletes[0] + m_added_deletes[1] + m_added_deletes[2]) << endl;
00648   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tcollisions\t" << collisions << endl;
00649   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tcached\t" << cached << endl;
00650   cout << flush;
00651 }

00653 
00654 void Range::lock() {
00655   for (AccessGroupMapT::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++)
00656     (*iter).second->lock();
00657 }
00658 
00659 
00660 void Range::unlock(uint64_t real_timestamp) {
00661   // This is a performance optimization to maintain the logical timestamp without excessive locking
00662   {
00663     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00664     m_timestamp.logical = m_last_logical_timestamp;
00665     m_timestamp.real = real_timestamp;
00666   }
00667   for (AccessGroupMapT::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++)
00668     (*iter).second->unlock();
00669 }

00672 
00675 void Range::replay_transfer_log(CommitLogReader *commit_log_reader, uint64_t real_timestamp) {
00676   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00677   uint8_t *base, *ptr, *end;
00678   size_t len;
00679   ByteString key, value;
00680   size_t nblocks = 0;
00681   size_t count = 0;
00682   TableIdentifier table_id;
00683   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00684 
00685   try {
00686 
00687     while (commit_log_reader->next((const uint8_t **)&base, &len, &header)) {
00688 
00689       ptr = base;
00690       end = base + len;
00691 
00692       table_id.decode((uint8_t **)&ptr, &len);
00693 
00694       if (strcmp(m_identifier.name, table_id.name))
00695         throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_COMMIT_LOG, 
00696                         format("Table name mis-match in split log replay \"%s\" != \"%s\"", m_identifier.name, table_id.name));
00697 
00698       memory_added += len;
00699 
00700       while (ptr < end) {
00701         key.ptr = ptr;
00702         ptr += key.length();
00703         value.ptr = ptr;
00704         ptr += value.length();
00705         add(key, value, real_timestamp);
00706         count++;
00707       }
00708       nblocks++;
00709     }
00710 
00711     {
00712       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00713       HT_INFOF("Replayed %d updates (%d blocks) from split log '%s' into %s[%s..%s]",
00714                count, nblocks, commit_log_reader->get_log_dir().c_str(),
00715                m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00716     }
00717 
00718     Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
00719     Global::memory_tracker.add_items(count);
00720 
00721     m_added_inserts = 0;
00722     memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00723 
00724   }
00725   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00726     HT_ERRORF("Problem replaying split log - %s '%s'", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00727     throw;
00728   }
00729 }
00730 
00731 
00735 void Range::increment_update_counter() {
00736   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_maintenance_mutex);
00737   while (m_hold_updates)
00738     m_maintenance_finished_cond.wait(lock);
00739   m_update_counter++;
00740 }
00741 
00742 
00746 void Range::decrement_update_counter() {
00747   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_maintenance_mutex);
00748   m_update_counter--;
00749   if (m_hold_updates && m_update_counter == 0)
00750     m_update_quiesce_cond.notify_one();
00751 }
00752 
00753 
00756 uint64_t Range::get_latest_timestamp() {
00757   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00758   return m_timestamp.logical;
00759 }
00760 
00761 
00764 bool Range::get_scan_timestamp(Timestamp &ts) {
00765   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00766   return m_scanner_timestamp_controller.get_oldest_update_timestamp(&ts);
00767 }
